page.name: The Write Space
page.description: Do you love to write creative stories? Would you like to make your talent stronger? Then you’ve come to the right place! “The Write Space” is an interactive writing club where you learn to improve your writing skills through interactive mini-lessons, spend time  sharing your writing with other students, and develop your talent with the help of your peers. Meetings will be held every Thursday in room 217 with Mrs. Hahn from 2:30-3:15.
